Independent Candidate for Uxbridge and South Ruislip by-election
Kingsley Hamilton is registered as an Independent Candidate for The Uxbridge and South Ruislip By-Election on 20 July 2023. Kingsley who is a British National, is of Greek Cypriot Descent, and is the owner of the Action Against Unfair ULEZ Facebook Page, which currently has over 43,000 members.
https://.facebook.com/groups/stoptheulez
https://stop-ulez.com/
When not working as a bus driver, Kingsley spends much of his free time volunteering for various charities and good causes. He has previously been a volunteer for Radio Lollipop, Great Ormond Street Hospital, and helped to set up Sutton Night Watch a homeless charity. He has helped out on fundraising events for Celeb FC Charity Football, and Homeless but Human. Furthermore, Kingsley provides support to AFC Wimbledon Foundation and is a current volunteer for Dons Local Action Group (a food bank charity).
Notably, Kingsley Hamilton regularly acts at RAF Events as The Official Standard Bearer for the RAF Association at RAF Kenley, in Surrey, and represents the RAF Association at the funerals of many deceased veterans to give them a good send-off, many of whom he has not even met before.
Many years ago, Kingsley was a DJ for Hayes FM between 2008 – 2011, and also featured on The London Bridge show on Orla FM; a Polish Radio Station between 2008 – 2014.
